responses.rationale: The phrase 'collateral damage' is a loaded metaphor framing the negative impact.
Factual reporting of expert statement on risk without explicit framing cues.
Quoted source uses loaded language 'bad guy viruses' to frame the virus negatively.
Vivid description of symptoms ('Screaming very loud, whole-body tremors') is an explicit cue.
Quoted source uses explicit alarmist language ('going to be a pandemic virus soon').
The verb 'surge' is a vivid verb describing the price increase (realised impact).
Factual reporting of differential risk without explicit framing cues.
The phrase 'real risk' uses 'real' as an intensifier applied to risk.
